languages.text: "Я читала о подобном!" {n}Прижав к лицу платок, Кассия с интересом склоняется над телом.{/n} "Святая Кирина искала предателей, и Император в ответ на ее молитвы явил чудо — во рту праведницы оказалось враново перо, что начертало имена врагов".

traits.locale_text: "Я читала о подобном!" {n}Несмотря на тошнотворный запах, Кассия с интересом склоняется над телом.{/n} "Святая Кирина искала предателей, и Император в ответ на ее молитвы явил чудо — во рту праведницы оказалось враново перо, что начертало имена врагов".

languages.text: "I read about something quite similar!" {n}Clutching a handkercher to her face, Cassia leans over the body with interest.{/n} "Saint Quirine was looking for traitors, and the Emperor answered her prayers with a miracle: a raven quill appeared out of her mouth and wrote down the names of the enemies."
languages.original_text: "Я читала о подобном!" {n}Прижав к лицу платок, Кассия с интересом склоняется над телом.{/n} "Святая Кирина искала предателей, и Император в ответ на ее молитвы явил чудо — во рту праведницы оказалось враново перо, что начертало имена врагов".

traits.locale_text: "I read about something like this!" {n}Clutching a handkerchief to her face, Cassia bends over the body with interest.{/n} "Saint Quirina was looking for traitors, and the Emperor answered her prayers with a miracle. A raven quill came to be in the mouth of the righteous woman that wrote the names of the enemies."

"I read about something like this!" {n}Clutching a handkerchief to her face, Cassia bends over the body with interest.{/n} "Saint Quirina was looking for traitors, and the Emperor answered her prayers with a miracle. A raven quill came to be in the mouth of the righteous woman that wrote the names of the enemies."

"I read about something like this!" {n}Clutching a handkerchief to her face, Cassia bends over the body with interest.{/n} "Saint Quirina was looking for traitors, and the Emperor answered her prayers with a miracle: a raven quill came to be in the mouth of the righteous woman that wrote down the names of the enemies."

"I read about something like this!" {n}Clutching a handkerchief to her face, Cassia bends over the body with interest.{/n} "Saint Quirina was looking for traitors, and the Emperor answered her prayers with a miracle: a raven quill came to be in the mouth of the righteous woman that wrote down the names of the enemies."

"I read about something like this!" {n}Clutching a handkerchief to her face, Cassia bends over the body with interest.{/n} "Saint Quirina was looking for traitors, and the Emperor answered her prayers with a miracle: a raven quill came to be in the mouth of the righteous woman that wrote down the names of the enemies."

"I read about something quite similar!" {n}Clutching a handkercher to her face, Cassia leans over the body with interest.{/n} "Saint Quirine was looking for traitors, and the Emperor answered her prayers with a miracle: a raven quill appeared out of her mouth and wrote down the names of the enemies."

"I read about something quite similar!" {n}Clutching a handkercher to her face, Cassia leans over the body with interest.{/n} "Saint Quirine was looking for traitors, and the Emperor answered her prayers with a miracle: a raven quill appeared out of her mouth and wrote down the names of the enemies."

languages.text: «¡He leído sobre algo similar!». {n}Con un pañuelo en la cara, Cassia se inclina sobre el cuerpo con curiosidad.{/n} «Cuando santa Quirine buscaba traidores, el Emperador respondió a sus plegarias con un milagro: apareció una pluma de cuervo en su boca y escribió los nombres de sus enemigos».
languages.original_text: "I read about something quite similar!" {n}Clutching a handkercher to her face, Cassia leans over the body with interest.{/n} "Saint Quirine was looking for traitors, and the Emperor answered her prayers with a miracle: a raven quill appeared out of her mouth and wrote down the names of the enemies."

traits.locale_text: «¡He leído sobre algo similar!». {n}Con un pañuelo en la cara, Cassia se inclina sobre el cuerpo con curiosidad.{/n} «Cuando santa Quirine buscaba traidores, el Emperador respondió a sus plegarias con un milagro: apareció una pluma de cuervo en su boca y escribió los nombres de sus enemigos».

languages.text: 「似たようなことを読んだことがあるます！」{n}カシアはハンカチを顔に当て、興味深げに遺体の上に身を乗り出した。 {/n}「聖キリーヌが裏切り者を探していた時、皇帝が彼女の祈りに奇跡を見せました。彼女の口からカラスの羽ペンが出て、敵の名前を書き記したんです」
languages.original_text: "I read about something quite similar!" {n}Clutching a handkercher to her face, Cassia leans over the body with interest.{/n} "Saint Quirine was looking for traitors, and the Emperor answered her prayers with a miracle: a raven quill appeared out of her mouth and wrote down the names of the enemies."

traits.locale_text: 「似たようなことを読んだことがあるます！」{n}カシアはハンカチを顔に当て、興味深げに遺体の上に身を乗り出した。 {/n}「聖キリーヌが裏切り者を探していた時、皇帝が彼女の祈りに奇跡を見せました。彼女の口からカラスの羽ペンが出て、敵の名前を書き記したんです」

languages.text: “我以前读到过某个非常相似的故事！”{n}卡西娅用手帕捂着脸，兴奋地看着尸体。{/n}“当圣奎里恩寻找叛徒的时候，帝皇赐予了她奇迹，回应了她的祈祷。一支由乌鸦羽毛制成的羽毛笔忽然出现在她嘴里，写下了敌人的名字。”
languages.original_text: "I read about something quite similar!" {n}Clutching a handkercher to her face, Cassia leans over the body with interest.{/n} "Saint Quirine was looking for traitors, and the Emperor answered her prayers with a miracle: a raven quill appeared out of her mouth and wrote down the names of the enemies."

traits.locale_text: “我以前读到过某个非常相似的故事！”{n}卡西娅用手帕捂着脸，兴奋地看着尸体。{/n}“当圣奎里恩寻找叛徒的时候，帝皇赐予了她奇迹，回应了她的祈祷。一支由乌鸦羽毛制成的羽毛笔忽然出现在她嘴里，写下了敌人的名字。”

languages.text: "Ich habe von etwas Ähnlichem schon gelesen!" {n}Cassia presst ein Taschentuch auf Mund und Nase und beugt sich interessiert über die Leiche.{/n} "Die heilige Quirine suchte nach Verrätern, und der Imperator erhörte ihr Gebet mit einem Wunder: Eine Rabenfeder trat aus ihrem Mund und schrieb die Namen der Feinde nieder."
languages.original_text: "I read about something quite similar!" {n}Clutching a handkercher to her face, Cassia leans over the body with interest.{/n} "Saint Quirine was looking for traitors, and the Emperor answered her prayers with a miracle: a raven quill appeared out of her mouth and wrote down the names of the enemies."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe von etwas Ähnlichem schon gelesen!" {n}Cassia presst ein Taschentuch auf Mund und Nase und beugt sich interessiert über die Leiche.{/n} "Die heilige Quirine suchte nach Verrätern, und der Imperator erhörte ihr Gebet mit einem Wunder: Eine Rabenfeder trat aus ihrem Mund und schrieb die Namen der Feinde nieder."

languages.text: « J'ai lu quelque chose de très similaire, dans un de mes ouvrages ! » {n}Le nez caché sous un mouchoir, Cassia se penche sur le cadavre avec intérêt.{/n} « Sainte Quirine pourchassait des traîtres, et l'Empereur a répondu à ses prières en accomplissant un miracle : une plume de corbeau a surgi de sa bouche comme par magie avant d'écrire sous ses yeux les noms de ses ennemis. »
languages.original_text: "I read about something quite similar!" {n}Clutching a handkercher to her face, Cassia leans over the body with interest.{/n} "Saint Quirine was looking for traitors, and the Emperor answered her prayers with a miracle: a raven quill appeared out of her mouth and wrote down the names of the enemies."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai lu quelque chose de très similaire, dans un de mes ouvrages ! » {n}Le nez caché sous un mouchoir, Cassia se penche sur le cadavre avec intérêt.{/n} « Sainte Quirine pourchassait des traîtres, et l'Empereur a répondu à ses prières en accomplissant un miracle : une plume de corbeau a surgi de sa bouche comme par magie avant d'écrire sous ses yeux les noms de ses ennemis. »

languages.text: "Buna çok benzer bir şey okumuştum!" {n}Yüzüne mendil tutan Cassia, ilgiyle cesedin üzerine uzanıyor.{/n} "Azize Quirine, hainleri arıyordu. İmparator da bir mucize eşliğinde dualarına yanıt verdi. Ağzında bir kuzgun tüyü belirerek düşmanlarının isimlerini yazdı."
languages.original_text: "I read about something quite similar!" {n}Clutching a handkercher to her face, Cassia leans over the body with interest.{/n} "Saint Quirine was looking for traitors, and the Emperor answered her prayers with a miracle: a raven quill appeared out of her mouth and wrote down the names of the enemies."
